scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - Open curly bracket policy
scan_linter_check.short_description: Checks if opening curly brackets are on the next line (instead of the same line)

sys_update_version.name: scan_linter_check_83598744db030950bcced03cd396194d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="scan_linter_check"><scan_linter_check action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><category>code_sanity</category><description/><documentation_url/><name>CodeSanity - Open curly bracket policy </name><priority>1</priority><resolution_details/><run_condition/><score_max>100</score_max><score_min>0</score_min><score_scale>1</score_scale><script><![CDATA[(function (engine) {

	var GetStringValue = x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue;	
	var strSource = GetStringValue(engine.rootNode.toSource());
	
	Log(strSource);
	
	if (/^.+(\{).*$/.test(strSource))
	{
		engine.finding.incrementWithNode(engine.rootNode);
	}

})(engine);]]></script><short_description>Checks if opening curly brackets are on the next line (instead of the same line)</short_description><sys_class_name>scan_linter_check</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-19 13:32:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>83598744db030950bcced03cd396194d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CodeSanity - Open curly bracket policy </sys_name><sys_package display_value="CodeSanity WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_codesanity">8ed42c23dbad0510bcced03cd39619ce</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CodeSanity WORK IN PROGRESS">8ed42c23dbad0510bcced03cd39619ce</sys_scope><sys_update_name>scan_linter_check_83598744db030950bcced03cd396194d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 13:44:13</sys_updated_on></scan_linter_check></record_update>
